recipes.title: Dutch Oven Campfire Chili
recipes.description: Hearty chili cooked in a Dutch oven over campfire coals.
recipes.ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 2 cans beans, 3 cans tomatoes, 2 tbsp chili powder
recipes.steps: Combine all ingredients in a Dutch oven and cook over campfire coals for 1-2 hours.

recipes.title: Campfire Pizza
recipes.description: Delicious pizza cooked in a Dutch oven over a campfire.
recipes.ingredients: 1 package pizza dough, 1 cup tomato sauce, 2 cups cheese, toppings of your choice
recipes.steps: Roll out pizza dough, add sauce, cheese, and toppings. Cook in a preheated Dutch oven over campfire until the crust is golden.

recipes.title: Dutch Oven Peach Cobbler
recipes.description: Sweet peach cobbler baked in a Dutch oven over campfire coals.
recipes.ingredients: 4 peaches, 1 cup sugar, 1.5 cups flour, 0.5 cup butter, 1 tsp cinnamon
recipes.steps: Mix peaches, sugar, and cinnamon. In a Dutch oven, layer peaches and cover with a mixture of flour, sugar, and butter. Cook in the campfire coals until bubbly and golden brown.

recipes.title: Campfire Grilled Chicken Skewers
recipes.description: Flavorful chicken skewers grilled over a campfire for the perfect outdoor meal.
recipes.ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast, bell peppers, onions, olive oil, salt, pepper
recipes.steps: Marinate chicken in olive oil, salt, and pepper. Skewer chicken with bell peppers and onions. Grill over the campfire until chicken is cooked through.

recipes.title: Dutch Oven Bacon and Cheese Campfire Potatoes
recipes.description: Savory bacon and cheese potatoes cooked in a Dutch oven over campfire coals.
recipes.ingredients: 4 potatoes, 1 cup shredded cheese, 6 slices bacon, green onions
recipes.steps: Slice potatoes and layer in a Dutch oven with shredded cheese and bacon. Cook over campfire coals until potatoes are tender and bacon is crispy. Garnish with chopped green onions.

recipes.title: Dutch Oven Campfire Breakfast Burritos
recipes.description: Hearty breakfast burritos cooked in a Dutch oven over campfire coals.
recipes.steps: Scramble eggs and cook with sausage in a Dutch oven. Assemble burritos with eggs, cheese, and salsa. Warm in the Dutch oven over campfire coals.
